package.description:
ICoreAllocator defines an abstract interface for dynamic memory allocation. It consists of two variations of alloc and one free function. Specialized versions of operator new and new[] are also provided. This interface will be used by Next Generation Ignition technologies.
No implementation of the interface is provided in this package; users are expected to supply their own. We encourage the use of the PPMalloc allocator.
package.changes: Added frameworkVersion and buildable tags to the manifest file. There are no code changes.
